name: Bountiful
headline: An Operating System for agriculture.
description:
We’re on a mission to optimize the agricultural industry.

When we started Bountiful in 2015, the grape error rate for predicting production was 30 percent. Why? We found that many farmers in the specialty crops space were still using traditional pencil-and-paper techniques to predict yield. These low-fidelity forecasting methods weren’t giving them a clear enough understanding of their production until it was too late, leading to waste and inefficiency throughout the supply chain.

We saw a problem we wanted to solve.

Today, Bountiful is using advanced data science to help farmers forecast more accurately, so they can make better decisions. In the last three years, we’ve combined the latest in machine learning with weather, satellite, geographic, and historical data. The result is a user-friendly platform that transforms volumes of complex agricultural information into simple, actionable insights farmers can use to run more economically and environmentally sustainable farms.

More recently, we’re working to open the dialogue between buyers and sellers, remove uncertainty, and provide clarity to the supply chain to meet global food demand.

Our ultimate goal is to close the agricultural margin of error. Not only will this make individual farms more efficient, profitable, and sustainable, but it will help optimize the global food supply chain. That means healthier people and a healthier planet.

# 
Farm Market Buy
Market smarter with actionable forecasting 
[ Get Started For Free ](https://bountiful.ag/<https:/bountiful.ag/sign-up-for-free>)
![Bountiful yield months before harvest](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/know-your-yield-months-before-harvest.png)
## Your complete guide to specialty crops 
Bountiful provides data-driven, yield forecasts and transparent analytics for farmers and food and agricultural industry professionals. Our tools take the guesswork out of farming, from yield to market, year after year.
And with [Bountiful](https://bountiful.ag/<https:/medium.com/@BountifulAg/bountiful-farm-better-with-actionable-forecasting-b68411df1f12>), you have at your hands the most trusted, empowering, and seamless tool for smarter agriculture.
Bountiful is your complete guide to specialty crop agriculture and markets. 
![Bountiful yield months before harvest](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/know-your-yield-months-before-harvest.png)
## Solutions
![Bountiful Farming](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/themes/bountiful/assets/images/farming.svg)
### Bountiful Agriculture
Your guide to crop yield forecasts that evolve throughout the growing season. We provide the missing link to understand crop production; for farmers or food and agriculture industry professionals.
[ Learn more ](https://bountiful.ag/</bountiful-agriculture-analytics-and-yield-forecasts/>)
![Bountiful Marketplace](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/themes/bountiful/assets/images/marketplace.svg)
### Bountiful Market
Your daily guide to the almond market. Bridging the gap from data to sentiment, our data-driven insights support your decision-making; for farmers or food and agriculture industry professionals.
[ Learn more ](https://bountiful.ag/</bountiful-market/>)
![Bountiful Finance](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/themes/bountiful/assets/images/finance.svg)
### Bountiful OS
An operating system for agriculture. Bringing together all your important data in one place: production, bearing acres, yield, quality, field locations, benchmarking, costs, pricing, emissions, forecasting, and more.
[ Learn More ](https://bountiful.ag/</bountiful-os/>)
## How we’ve impacted farming
![How we’ve impacted farming, bountiful yield forecasting](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/how-we-have-impacted-farming.jpg)
![2.5M](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/themes/bountiful/assets/images/grapes-icon.svg)
### 2.5M
Almond, Grape and Walnut acres forecasted in 2023
![95%](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/themes/bountiful/assets/images/forecasting-icon.svg)
### 95%
Accuracy forecasting yield in specialty crops since 2017
![45M](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/themes/bountiful/assets/images/historical-icon.svg)
### 45M
Pounds of almond net good meats digitized for OS in 2023
![$29K](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/themes/bountiful/assets/images/water-icon.svg)
### $29K
Average yearly savings on labor and in office staff
## Our Support
![Spacenews](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/spacenews.png) ![FFA](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/ffa.png) ![Fast Company](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/fastcompany.png) ![Y Combinator](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/combinator.png) ![TC](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/tc.png) ![Ag Funder](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/agfunder.png) ![Westside Conect](https://vinsight.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/westsideconnect.png)
“By sharing actionable insights in new ways with farmers and the supply chain, Bountiful is changing the future of farming for a multitude of high-value, speciality crops.”
Rob Trice
Better Food Ventures

generated_description:
### Bountiful: Redefining Agricultural Efficiency 

Founded in 2015 and hailing from the vibrant San Francisco Bay Area, Bountiful is on a mission to revolutionize the agricultural industry with its innovative approach—a robust operating system for farmers. Before Bountiful came onto the scene, predicting crop yields was fraught with inaccuracies; the grape yield prediction error rate was a staggering 30%. Many farmers, particularly in the specialty crops sector, relied on outdated methods like pencil and paper, which delayed critical insights and led to significant waste and inefficiency.

Seeing this as a problem ripe for innovation, the founders set out to harness the power of advanced data science. They developed a platform that integrates machine learning with a plethora of data sources—weather patterns, satellite imagery, geographical factors, and historical trends—allowing farmers to forecast their yields with remarkable accuracy. Today, Bountiful boasts a 95% accuracy rate in predicting yields for specialty crops, and its insights are causing ripples of positive change across the agricultural value chain.

Bountiful offers a suite of solutions including:

- **Bountiful OS**: This is their core operating system designed to consolidate critical farming data—from production and quality metrics to costs and forecasting—into a single platform, streamlining operations for farmers.
  
- **Bountiful Agriculture**: Farmers receive ongoing, data-driven yield forecasts that adapt throughout the growth season, transforming farming decisions.
  
- **Bountiful Market**: A marketplace connecting farmers with the latest market insights and trends, helping them make informed decisions about what to plant and sell.

As part of Y Combinator’s Batch W17, Bountiful is backed by a seasoned group of experts and has successfully grown to a tight-knit team of four passionate employees. They don't just focus on enhancing individual farms; their broader vision aims to optimize the entire global food supply chain. Through improving forecasting and fostering communication between buyers and sellers, Bountiful is addressing more than just farm-level efficiencies—it's working to achieve a more sustainable and healthy planet.

To learn more about their offerings or to get started with their platform, visit [Bountiful's website](https://bountiful.ag/). Whether you are a seasoned farmer or just stepping into the agricultural world, Bountiful is your guide to smarter, data-driven farming.
